name: Chavez
descriptions: Chavez is a Powder Ganger living at Powder Ganger camp south in 2281.

Chavez formed a splinter gang with a small crew of fellow escaped convicts that have moved south of the NCR Correctional Facility to plunder passing-by traders and other Mojave inhabitants. Chavez and his crew decided that instead of turning in their "acquisitions" to Eddie, they would keep it all for themselves.
There was originally an option that Chavez could have been imprisoned during I Fought the Law, but this was cut from the game.

topics.response_text: You just walked into the wrong camp, my friend. Hand over everything you've got and we might let you live.

topics.topic_text: Eddie sent me to deal with you.
topics.response_text: That's nothing new. Am I supposed to be impressed?

topics.topic_text: {Terrifying Presence}< Cock your head and grin. >
I'm not going to let you live.
Eddie's just going to keep chasing you. Quit while you're ahead... and alive.
topics.response_text: [SUCCEEDED] All right. Pickings were getting slim around here anyway.
Letting you just walk away isn't how it works, I'm afraid.

conversation.response_text: Aw, come on! Don't leave me here!
